meta.name: description
meta.content: The East Bridgewater Public School district, in partnership with the community, continues to provide an academically challenging, safe, and supportive learning environment that promotes the pursuit of excellence for all.

div.br: The East Bridgewater Public School district, in partnership with the community, continues to provide an academically challenging, safe and supportive learning environment that promotes the pursuit of excellence for all.

div.div: Location: Anne Kenneally Hynes Library, East Bridgewater Public Schools

article.aria-label: East Bridgewater Public Schools Winter Break

h3.a: East Bridgewater Public Schools Winter Break

div.div: There will be no remote learning on Monday, April 20, 2020. There will be no lunches available for pickup. Lunch pickup will resume on Tuesday, April 21, 2020 through Friday, April 24, 2020 from 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM. Enjoy your time off!!

h3.a: School Choice Applications for 2020/2021 School Year

div.div: The East Bridgewater Public School District is currently accepting applications under School Choice for students entering into grades 7-12 for the 2020/2021 school year. Click on the link above for the application package.

The East Bridgewater School Committee at their regular meeting on April 14, 2020 voted unanimously to revise the 2019/2020 school calendar to cancel the April 2020 school break. Remote learning will be held on Tuesday, April 21st through Friday, April 24th. There will be no remote learning on Monday, April 20th, in observation of the state holiday, Patriot’s Day. By cancelling the April 2020 break, this will allow the last day of school to be June 16, 2020. Stay safe & healthy!

div.br:
Welcome to our school! I am so pleased to welcome our new students as well as our returning students. We have made many recent improvements to our campus and we continue to expand our extra-curricular programs to ensure that all students may make the most of their time and explore a broad variety of interests.
Our new website is designed to provide parents with all the information they need to be active participants in their student’s education. You will find that the site works just as well on mobile devices as it does on a desktop so you can find information on the go. As always, I am happy to receive feedback and suggestions and my door is always open.
Here’s to another great year!
